biotools.summary: The Neuroinformatics for Personalized Medicine toolBox (NeuroPM-box) is a free cross-platform user-friendly multitool software for advanced integration of molecular, histopathological, multimodal neuroimaging, and therapeutic data.

bioschemas.name: NeuroPM-box
